nodes.text: "Tialga Hath Fallen" was a traditional air, originating from the planet Alderaan, about the deeds of a warrior-queen. A percussion arrangement of the air was played by the Galactic Alliance Navy Drum Corps during Admiral Cha Niathal's funeral on Coruscant in 43.5 ABY. During the procession, the traditional Alderaanian flutes were substituted for by sequential bells. Journalist Javis Tyrr reported on the funeral procession for the HoloNet, giving mention to the air.
